name: The Grotto
description: The Grotto is a Layer 1 blockchain and application suite tailored to the creative underground. Developed by The City, LLC and set within the surreal and dystopian universe of Analog Distortions, The Grotto is a living platform that empowers creators to distribute their games, art, and tools in a direct and decentralized way.

chains.name: TheGrotto
chains.description: L1 blockchain for indie developers, musicians, visual artists, and players focused on games, art, and creative tools distribution
